alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:30PM EDT until August 10 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...NORTHERN GLOUCESTER...WEST CENTRAL BURLINGTON AND SOUTHERN PHILADELPHIA COUNTIES... At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Audubon Park, or over Gloucester City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Camden, Gloucester City, Cherry Hill, Deptford, Voorhees, Lindenwold, Bellmawr, Woodbury, Magnolia, Westville, Woodbury Heights, Brooklawn, Audubon Park, Barclay-Kingston, Cherry Hill Mall, Echelon, Golden Triangle, Ashland and Springdale. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 3. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 18. Interstate 76 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 24 and 37. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 2. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
